ro.uaic.info.optdist.script

Class OptDistService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.uaic.info.optdist.script.OptDistService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xwiki.script.service.ScriptService

    @Component
 @Named(value="OptDist")
 @Singleton
public class OptDistService
extends Object
implements org.xwiki.script.service.ScriptService
    The class that implements the project's logic and exposes an API to the xWiki scripting engine. Functionalities exposed are: starting the submission period, accepting a submitted form, starting the student/optional distribution algorithm, exporting the distribution results and resetting all data so that the process can be restarted.

      • beginSubmissions

        public String beginSubmissions()
                        throws Exception
        Starts accepting preference forms from students.

        First, this method initialises this.students and this.packages. Second, it imports into the students from the path in this.studsExcelPath, and imports the packages into this.packages from the URL at this.packagesUrl. At this point, the server is ready to accept forms from the student.

        Returns:
        "Succes!" on success or "Esec!" on failure
        Throws:
        Exception

      • submitForm

        public String submitForm(String nrMatricol,
                         String... preferences)
        Validates a form containing the preferences of a student then exports it to the database for the distribution process.
        Parameters:
        nrMatricol - registration number of the student that submitted the form
        preferences - an array of optional IDs ordered by the student's preference
        Returns:
        status message

      • distribute

        public void distribute()
        Starts the distribution algorithm with the data in this.students and this.packages.

      • exportDistribution

        public void exportDistribution()
        Exports the distribution results in the predetermined format.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the data in this.students and this.packages so that the submitting process can be restarted.
